snippet: Justin Verlander, who won Cy Young and Most Valuable Player awards last season, said he still hoped to improve as a pitcher.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column; Detroit Tigers pitcher Justin Verlander, who won Cy Young and Most Valuable Player awards in 2011, says he still hopes to improve on the mound; is scheduled to start for Detroit's season opener.
lead_paragraph: Justin Verlander, who won Cy Young and Most Valuable Player awards last season, said he still hoped to improve as a pitcher.

headline.seo: Tigers’ Verlander Sets Expectations Ever Higher
headline.main: Tigers’ Verlander Setting Expectations Ever Higher
headline.print_headline: Tigers’ Verlander Setting Expectations Ever Higher
